scorer.text: Our company is committed to reducing carbon emissions by 50% by 2030 and has implemented comprehensive waste management systems.
We have no formal environmental policies and do not track our carbon footprint.

classifier.text: Our company has achieved ISO 14001 certification and maintains a robust environmental management system.
We have not conducted any environmental impact assessments in the past 5 years.

detector.text: Our products are 100% natural and eco-friendly, even though they contain synthetic chemicals.
We have achieved carbon neutrality through verified emissions reductions and renewable energy investments.

classifier.text: Our 'green' products are made from sustainable materials, but we don't disclose the actual environmental impact.
We publish annual sustainability reports that are verified by independent auditors.
